Title: Relates to licensing consequences for architects or engineers who seriously abuse their self-certification privileges
Summary: Relates to licensing consequences for architects or engineers who seriously abuse their self-certification privileges; the board of regents shall immediately suspend the professional license of an individual found to have seriously abused the professional certification program of the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to licensing consequences for architects or engineers who seriously abuse their self-certification privileges
